# Unicode.GeneralCategory.uppercaseLetter

**Case**

An uppercase letter.

## Declaration

```swift
case uppercaseLetter
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Uppercase_Letter` (abbreviated `Lu`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.uppercaseLetter
